spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (open lounge/dining left, kitchen central-top, two bedrooms right, bath+WC central-bottom, separate garage). However several plan-to-render mismatches are evident: the entry/linen zone is not clearly modeled as a distinct closet; the hall/door cluster near bath/WC is reconfigured with different door positions and swing/orientation; the robe/wardrobe location does not match the plan (render shows a long built-in along the corridor/bedroom side rather than the small RO BE location shown near the kitchen/bedroom junction). Window placement also deviates (render adds/reshapes openings on external walls compared to the plan’s limited, specific openings). Minor-to-moderate proportion drift in corridor width and wet-area sizing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Key adjacencies are mostly correct (kitchen adjacent to living; bath and WC near corridor; bedrooms grouped). But fidelity issues remain: the linen closet at entry appears missing/merged; robe placement is inconsistent; door embedding/orientation around the bath/WC/bedroom hall does not follow the 2D plan exactly; exterior openings do not consistently match the plan. No clearly new room is invented, but storage elements appear hallucinated/relocated.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are plausible (sofa + dining set in living, beds in both bedrooms). Kitchen/bath fixtures are present but not clearly matching the 2D intent (wet-area fittings and storage/robe placement). Some furniture scaling/proportion is acceptable, but not verifiably aligned to the given room dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric view with coherent lighting and generally clean geometry. Minor issues: openings/door panels look inconsistent in thickness and placement; some areas feel simplified/ambiguous (closets/wet-area details). Camera is a standard axonometric/isometric-like angle and composition is clear.

detected_errors.description: Linen closet at the Entry (shown in 2D plan) is not clearly present as a distinct enclosed closet with a door in the 3D render.
ROBE/storage location differs: the 2D plan shows a small robe near the kitchen/bedroom junction, while the 3D render depicts a long built-in wardrobe element along the bedroom/corridor side.
Door placements around the central hall (bath/WC/bedroom entries) do not precisely match the 2D plan’s door positions relative to wall junctions.
Several door swing/orientation directions appear inconsistent with the 2D plan (notably in the bath/WC/bedroom hall cluster).
Window/opening layout on exterior walls deviates from the 2D plan (render adds/reshapes openings such as larger multi-panel windows/doors not explicitly indicated).
Proportions drift: corridor and wet-area sizing/spacing in the 3D render appear altered compared with the tighter 2D plan layout.
